name: Peanut Butter Cheese Ball Pretzel Dip
author: Jewel Kingsley
summary: A quick and easy dessert dip for the pretzel and peanut butter lovers in your life. This yummy cheese ball is great for parties, tailgating, or just family movie night. Keep refrigerated until 30 minutes before you are ready to serve.
ingredients: ¼ cup chocolate sprinkles, or as needed  (Optional)
1 (7.2 ounce) package thin pretzel crackers (such as Snack Factory® Pretzel Crisps®)
directions: Combine peanut butter, cream cheese, and butter in a bowl; beat together with an electric mixer until creamy
Mix in confectioners' sugar, 1/2 cup at a time, until incorporated
Pour chocolate sprinkles onto a plate
Shape peanut butter mixture into a ball and roll in chocolate sprinkles until completely coated
Arrange pretzel crackers on the dish around the ball
Chill until firm, at least 1 hour
